title: Strange Land.First Entry into the Spirit Realm

scenes.description: 镜头淡入，云雾笼罩的仙域天空中金色卷轴舒展开来并闪烁灵光。

visual.composition: Immortal realm sky veiled in clouds,golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Sky of the immortal realm,mist-wreathed,golden radiance

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening,mist-shrouded immortal sky,golden scroll unfurling,spirit particles drifting,wide cinematic shot,film-grade lighting,4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第一集《陌生之地·初入灵界》。

scenes.description: 韩立躺在青灰色沙地上一动不动，感受地面升腾的燥热。

visual.composition: Han Li lying on gray-green sand

scenes.prompt: Han Li lying on gray-green sand,motionless,feeling the ground's dry heat.
scenes.narration: 韩立保持不动，静静体会脚下炽热的沙地。

scenes.description: 天空中同时浮现三个耀眼的太阳与四轮朦胧的月影。

visual.composition: Three dazzling suns and four faint lunar phantoms in the sky
visual.environment: Three brilliant suns,four hazy moon silhouettes

scenes.prompt: Three dazzling suns and four hazy lunar silhouettes appear in the sky.
scenes.narration: 他震惊地发现头顶竟悬着三颗烈日和四轮淡淡的月影。

scenes.description: 韩立回想空间节点的遭遇，面色渐渐阴沉。

visual.composition: Han Li recalls the spatial node ordeal,his expression darkens

scenes.prompt: Han Li recalls the spatial-node ordeal,his expression turning grim.
scenes.narration: 每当想起空间节点发生的一切，韩立的脸色就会暗沉下来，心底泛起寒意。

scenes.description: 他忆起与冰凤分离以及禁制爆发时的剧痛。

visual.composition: Han Li recalls separation from Ice Phoenix

scenes.prompt: Han Li recalls being separated from Ice Phoenix and the agony of the restriction flaring up.
scenes.narration: 被迫与冰凤分开后，二人互下的禁制再度作祟。

scenes.description: 韩立施展元婴虚化之法，将庞大的元婴精元灌注全身。

visual.composition: Han Li uses Nascent Soul Void method,energy flowing
visual.character_pose: Performing the Nascent Soul Void method
visual.fx: Nascent Soul essence flooding the body,visible energy flow

scenes.prompt: Han Li uses the Nascent Soul Void method,channeling its vast essence into his flesh.
scenes.narration: 他运转元婴虚化之法，硬生生将滚滚精元送入躯体每一处。

scenes.description: 他费力偏过头，只见一望无际的青灰砂砾。

visual.composition: Han Li strains to tilt his head,sees endless gray-green gravel

scenes.prompt: Han Li strains to tilt his head,revealing an endless expanse of gray-green gravel.
scenes.narration: 好不容易偏动头颅，映入眼帘的仍是无边无际的青灰沙砾。

scenes.description: 三颗太阳缩成两颗，最终只剩一颗，天空渐渐暗下。

visual.composition: Suns reduce from three to two to one,sky darkening
visual.environment: Sky darkening,suns diminishing from three to one

scenes.prompt: The suns dwindle from three to two to one as the sky begins to dim.
scenes.narration: 头顶的三轮烈日渐渐化作两轮，最终只剩下一轮，天色随之黯淡。

scenes.description: 韩立睁大双眼盯着高空，瞳孔里隐隐闪烁蓝芒。

visual.composition: Han Li's eyes widen,staring upward

scenes.prompt: Han Li's eyes widen,faint blue flickers in his pupils as he stares into the sky.
scenes.narration: 韩立非但没有闭眼，反而睁得更大，眼中泛起淡蓝光芒。

scenes.description: 刺耳尖鸣划破长空，二十多颗黑点从天俯冲而下。

visual.composition: Over twenty black dots appear in the sky,diving down

scenes.prompt: Shrill screeches echo as over twenty black dots dive from the sky.
scenes.narration: 附近上空响起凄厉尖鸣，一个个黑影相继扑向沙海。

scenes.description: 他看清那些是鹰首蝠身的黑色怪鸟，狰狞可怖。

visual.composition: Han Li sees eagle-headed bat-bodied black monstrous birds

scenes.prompt: Han Li makes out eagle-headed bat-bodied black monstrous birds,hideous and fierce.
scenes.narration: 每一只都是鹰首蝠身的黑色怪鸟，足有四五尺长。

scenes.description: 怪鸟疾冲到离地三十余丈处，目标正对准韩立。

visual.composition: Monstrous birds dive to thirty-plus zhang above ground,targeting Han Li

scenes.prompt: The monstrous birds swoop to thirty-plus zhang above ground,aiming straight at Han Li.
scenes.narration: 它们速度极快，眨眼间便压到离地三十多丈的低空。

scenes.description: 韩立头颅一偏，胸膛一瘪，吸起一团沙砾。

visual.composition: Han Li tilts head,hollows chest,inhales a clump of sand

scenes.prompt: Han Li tilts his head and sucks in a clump of sand.
scenes.narration: 他眼中寒芒一闪，微微侧首。

scenes.description: 沙砾在他唇边呼啸旋转，怪鸟逼近到十余丈。

visual.composition: Sand spins at his lips as birds close to ten-plus zhang

scenes.prompt: The sand spins at his lips while the monstrous birds close to ten-plus zhang.
scenes.narration: 那团沙砾在嘴边滴溜溜旋转，却始终不曾落下。

scenes.description: 他胸膛鼓起，喷出劲风，将沙砾化作青芒激射。

visual.composition: Han Li's chest expands,gust erupts,sand turns into green streaks

scenes.prompt: Han Li's chest swells; he exhales a fierce gust that turns the sand into green streaks.
scenes.narration: 韩立胸膛猛然鼓起，口中喷出白蒙蒙的狂风。

scenes.description: 青芒击中怪鸟，发出金属摩擦般的惨叫。

visual.composition: Green streaks strike birds,metallic screeches erupt

scenes.prompt: The green streaks slam into the birds,producing metallic screeches.
scenes.narration: 漫天青光砸在当头几只怪鸟身上，发出低沉闷响。

scenes.description: 剩下的怪鸟扑向受伤的同类，将其撕裂吞噬。

visual.composition: Remaining birds pounce on wounded kin,tearing them apart

scenes.prompt: The remaining birds pounce on their wounded kin,ripping them to pieces.
scenes.narration: 让人惊愕的是，剩余怪鸟一见同伴受创便蜂拥而上撕扯。

scenes.description: 最后一轮太阳渐渐黯淡，形态变化，七枚弯月即将出现。

visual.composition: Final sun dims,about to become seven crescent moons
visual.environment: Sky,last sun fading,seven crescents soon to appear

scenes.prompt: The last sun dims and begins shifting form,seven crescent moons about to emerge.
scenes.narration: 不知过了多久，天上最后的太阳也慢慢暗去。

scenes.description: 远处传来轰隆声，韩立神色一变。

visual.composition: Han Li's expression changes as distant rumbling reaches him

scenes.prompt: Han Li's expression shifts as distant rumbling approaches.
scenes.narration: 忽然韩立神情骤变，脸上浮现惊疑。

scenes.description: 一只拳头大小的赤红小鸟悬在头顶盘旋不去。

visual.composition: Fist-sized crimson firebird hovers above Han Li,circling

scenes.prompt: A fist-sized crimson firebird appears above Han Li,circling erratically.
scenes.narration: 一只浑身赤红的拳头大小怪鸟诡异地出现在他上空盘旋。

scenes.description: 地面轻轻震动，几名骑乘怪兽的骑士出现在远方。

visual.composition: Several beast-mounted riders appear in the distance

scenes.prompt: The ground trembles as several beast-mounted riders appear afar.
scenes.narration: 不多时大地微微颤动，远处出现几名骑着怪兽的骑士。

scenes.description: 画面淡出，夜色下的仙城剪影与灵光缓缓下落。

visual.composition: Night-time silhouette of immortal city,spirit light drifting down

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending,night silhouette of immortal city,spirit particles drifting,calm mystical mood,wide cinematic shot,film-grade lighting,4K
scenes.narration: 下集再见。我是云卷仙音，第二集的故事即将开始。
